name: Signum Sanguinis
description:
Name:  Signum Sanguinis

Genre: Gothic - Fantasy

Developers: Paolo Forteleoni, Luca Cavallini
Project devoloped for the VR course ("Realtà Virtuale") offered  by Politecnico di Torino in the academic year 2018/2019.

Controls:

WASD + mouse - Navigation

Shift - Run
spacebar - Jump
P - Pause
I  -Inventory
J - Journal
Left mouse button - Pick up items

Spellcasting  (sequence of controls):
R - Record a spell
Right mouse button - Trace the rune
R - Equip spell associated
Right mouse button - Cast the spell

Goal of the game:

Signum Sanguinis is a single player, first person experience of delving into a gothic dungeon.

The game is a working progress, there are currently two levels plus a tutorial. The most important mechanism is the spellcasting system, which is used for solving environmental puzzles and defeating enemies.
